# Changelog

## 1.0.1 - 2016-03-17

### Improved

* Listing contents now prevents 301 redirects by adding a trailing slash.

## 1.0.1 - 2015-05-18

### Fixed

* Corrected namespace for missing object exception catching.
* Corrected last-modified return type handling (int -> [int])


## 1.0.0

Initial release
